title: The MAILART Typeface
content:
MAILART   
   
Mailart Project by Keith Bates, 2004   
 [www.keithbates.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112350/http:/www.keithbates.co.uk/) - [keith@k-type.com](mailto:keith@k-type.com)   
   
This font may be used and distributed freely. Download it from   
  [http://www.keithbates.co.uk/font\_1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112350/http:/www.keithbates.co.uk/font_1.html)   
   
Towards the end of 2003 and the beginning of 2004, I sent out 150 or so snailmail and email invitations to mailartists whose graphic design flair led me to hope that they would each be keen to contribute a single character to the enclosed typeface, MAILART. In addition, I placed an invitation in the fonts section of my website ( [www.keithbates.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112350/http:/www.keithbates.co.uk/)) and also asked fellow mailartists to recommend another participant if they wished.
